A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film will leave you extremely disappointed if you are a fan of the Star Wars universe. JJ Abraham and George Lucas should be livid at the disgrace Rian Johnson created in TLJ. Rian\, you had no business writing an directing this film. If there is one positive to take away the visuals are stunning but is hard to overlook with such a poor storyline full of plot holes and disappointing reveals.
